"Xiemmy": "It's a pleasure to meet you. Oh, um... My name is Xiemmy, and I'm with the technological development team."
"I hear you're quite an amazing member of ARKS... So, I was wondering if I could... discuss some things with you...?"
"Well, actually... It'd be easier to explain in person, so... Would you be able to come see me?"
"It's good to speak with you again... Oh, this is Xiemmy from the technological development team speaking..."
"You see, um... Something else has come up that I could use your help with again... I-If you don't mind, that is."
"Well, um... It'd be easier to explain in person, so... Do you think you could come see me?"
